BE.name: Lufia®: The Legend Returns
BE.description: Wain a toujours voulu découvrir le monde, mais ne s'attendait pas à devoir se battre pour le sauver ! Suivez ce jeune chasseur et ses camarades dans une incroyable aventure, traversez de vastes continents et tentez d'arrêter un démon ancestral. Troisième jeu de la série et premier sur console portable, Lufia: The Legend Returns est doté de 12 personnages jouables, chacun avec leurs propres personnalité et attaques spéciales, d'une intrigue captivante, de systèmes de magie et de combat intenses, avec le retour des points d'habileté de rage obtenus en apprenant les attaques spéciales.

AU.name: Lufia®: The Legend Returns
AU.description: Wain always wanted to see the world, but he never expected he would end up fighting to save it! Follow the young warrior and his companions on an epic adventure that spans vast continents, as you try to stop an ancient evil. The third in the series, and the first for a handheld system, Lufia: The Legend Returns features 12 playable characters, each with their own unique personality and special attacks, plus a compelling storyline and in-depth battle and magic systems, including the return of Infuriating Point special attacks.

The third in the series, and the first for a handheld system, Lufia: The Legend Returns features 12 playable characters, each with their own unique personality and special attacks, plus a compelling storyline and in-depth battle and magic systems, including the return of Infuriating Point special attacks.

DE.name: Lufia®: The Legend Returns
DE.description: Wain wollte immer schon die Welt sehen, aber er hätte nie gedacht, dass er darum kämpfen müsste, sie zu retten! Folge dem jungen Krieger und seinen Gefährten in ein episches Abenteuer, das über riesige Kontinente führt, und halte dabei ein uraltes Böses auf. Der dritte Teil der Serie, Lufia: The Legend Returns, war der erste für eine tragbare Konsole und bietet 12 spielbare Charaktere, jeder mit einer einzigartigen Persönlichkeit und besonderen Spezialattacken, sowie eine spannende Geschichte und ein tiefgründiges Kampfsystem, inklusive der bekannten IP-Spezialattacken.

Der dritte Teil der Serie, Lufia: The Legend Returns, war der erste für eine tragbare Konsole und bietet 12 spielbare Charaktere, jeder mit einer einzigartigen Persönlichkeit und besonderen Spezialattacken, sowie eine spannende Geschichte und ein tiefgründiges Kampfsystem, inklusive der bekannten IP-Spezialattacken.

ES.name: Lufia®: The Legend Returns
ES.description: Wain siempre deseó ver mundo, pero lo que nunca se imaginó es que acabaría teniendo que luchar para salvarlo. ¡Únete al joven guerrero y a sus compañeros en una aventura épica a través de varios continentes, y consigue acabar con una fuerza maléfica ancestral! Lufia: The Legend Returns es el tercer juego de la serie y el primero disponible para una consola portátil. En él, podrás elegir entre 12 personajes distintos, cada uno con personalidades y ataques especiales únicos. A ello se suma una emocionante trama en la que podrás usar elaborados sistemas de combate y magia, así como el regreso de los ataques especiales de Puntos frenéticos.

The third in the series, and the first for a handheld system, Lufia: The Legend Returns features 12 playable characters, each with their own unique personality and special attacks, plus a compelling storyline and in-depth battle and magic systems, including the return of Infuriating Point special attacks.

IT.name: Lufia®: The Legend Returns
IT.description: Wain ha sempre sognato di vedere il mondo, ma non avrebbe mai pensato di dovere combattere per salvarlo dalla catastrofe! Segui il giovane guerriero e i suoi compagni in un'epica avventura per tutti i continenti e sgomina le forze sinistre di un male ancestrale! Lufia: The Legend Returns è il terzo episodio della saga, ma la prima versione disponibile per console portatile. Potrai scegliere tra 12 personaggi, ciascuno con una propria personalità e attacchi esclusivi, vivere una storia avvincente e studiare elaborate strategie di combattimento e attacchi magici, sfoderando colpi speciali grazie al ritorno della funzione Infuriating Point!

NO.name: Lufia®: The Legend Returns
NO.description: Wain always wanted to see the world, but he never expected he would end up fighting to save it! Follow the young warrior and his companions on an epic adventure that spans vast continents, as you try to stop an ancient evil. The third in the series, and the first for a handheld system, Lufia: The Legend Returns features 12 playable characters, each with their own unique personality and special attacks, plus a compelling storyline and in-depth battle and magic systems, including the return of Infuriating Point special attacks.

PT.name: Lufia®: The Legend Returns
PT.description: Wain sempre desejou conhecer o mundo, mas nunca imaginou que teria que lutar para o salvar. Acompanha este jovem guerreiro e os seus companheiros numa aventura épica através de vastos continentes e tenta acabar com uma força maléfica ancestral! Lufia: The Legend Returns é o terceiro jogo da série e o primeiro disponível para uma consola portátil, onde poderás encontrar 12 personagens jogáveis, cada uma com personalidades e estratégias de ataque únicas, assim como uma história emocionante, sistemas de combate e magia elaborados, incluindo ataques especiais graças ao regresso da funcionalidade Infuriating Point.

Troisième jeu de la série et premier sur console portable, Lufia: The Legend Returns est doté de 12 personnages jouables, chacun avec leurs propres personnalité et attaques spéciales, d'une intrigue captivante, de systèmes de magie et de combat intenses, avec le retour des points d'habileté de rage obtenus en apprenant les attaques spéciales.

The third in the series, and the first for a handheld system, Lufia: The Legend Returns features 12 playable characters, each with their own unique personality and special attacks, plus a compelling storyline and in-depth battle and magic systems, including the return of Infuriating Point special attacks.

NL.name: Lufia®: The Legend Returns
NL.description: Wain heeft altijd meer van de wereld willen zien. Nu moet hij vechten om de wereld te redden! Volg de jonge strijder en zijn kompanen op een fantastisch avontuur dat zich over enorme continenten uitstrekt, op jacht naar het oeroude kwaad. Dit derde deel in de reeks was het eerste deel voor een draagbaar spelsysteem. Lufia: The Legend Returns biedt 12 speelbare personages elk met zijn eigen personaliteit en special aanvallen, een meeslepend verhaal en een diepgaand gevechts- en spreukensysteem.

ZA.description: Wain always wanted to see the world, but he never expected he would end up fighting to save it! Follow the young warrior and his companions on an epic adventure that spans vast continents, as you try to stop an ancient evil. The third in the series, and the first for a handheld system, Lufia: The Legend Returns features 12 playable characters, each with their own unique personality and special attacks, plus a compelling storyline and in-depth battle and magic systems, including the return of Infuriating Point special attacks.

RU.name: Lufia®: The Legend Returns
RU.description: Wain мечтал увидеть мир, но никогда не думал, что однажды ему придется встать на его защиту. Юный воин и его друзья отправляются навстречу приключениям. Им предстоит пройти целые континенты, чтобы остановить первозданное зло. Lufia: The Legend Returns — третья часть игровой саги и первая игра для мобильной системы. Вас ждет интересный сюжет, 12 игровых персонажей (у каждого из них свой характер и специальные атаки), сложная система битв и заклинаний, а также атаки Infuriating Point.
